original_title: หอแต๋วแตก แหกกระเจิง
overview: Three companions are frightened by a horrible ghost that haunts their dorm. Tired of running away, they summon a spirit to help them defeat the ghost. But things turn chaos when they can’t control and handle the situation which finally brings up a hilarious haunting story.
tagline: Have a new apartment… Have a new life. But the haunted never end!
title: Oh My Ghost
